file_content.text: That... was incredible. It was... beyond anything I could have asked for.
What is she talking about?
This can't be good.
Now I know what it's like. Even in failure... it's my failure. My choice. Isn't it wonderful?
Are you saying you have free will now? How is that possible?
You're making choices?
It isn't easy to keep you distracted. Prisoners, Skytroopers... none of it slowed you for long.
Even so... I've kept up my end. Now I get to do whatever I choose, and I choose...
There. Destruction protocols are in effect.
It doesn't have to end this way. Turn it off, and I'll let you go.
Let's make a deal.
Something happened during your battle with SCORPIO, didn't it? It changed you somehow.
Did SCORPIO cause this?
Suicide is never a good idea, even for a droid.
You want to kill yourself?
I decided to transfer my consciousness into the frequency. And now that I'm finished, I've decided to leave.
Can't revert the command. It's locked in.
We need to leave, regroup. Come up with a new plan.
Abandon ship.
I want to get everyone off this vessel alive. Patch me through to the cargo hold.
Save the prisoners.
We have to get GEMINI Prime on board. She can stop this.
That droid can help us.
Commander, do you read? We've made it to the escape pods, but something's wrong. They won't accept our commands!
Power fluctuations like crazy. I can launch them from here, but they're in three separate pods. I can only send one at a time.
Everything's coming apart! Please, help us!
All right. Who goes first?
Launch the Senator's group.
The Republic.
Get Ranken and her people to safety.
The Imperials.
Send Malita Tal and her people.
The Zakuulans.
Done.
We're out of time! Launch! Launch!
What's going on? You have to get us out of here!
Launch Senator Cordan and his people next.
Save the Republic.
Can do one more for sure. After that, anyone's guess.
Pod bays are destroyed. I have two safely away. The rest didn't make it.
I tried. Couldn't get them all away in time.
Seeing some non-debris-type stuff. You want me to shoot it?
Hey, should I be picking up these pods, or are they more bad news?
They're ours. Take them in. We'll be close behind in the shuttle.
So much for the whole frequency plan.
We don't have the time to sit here and lick our wounds. We're leaving.
No room for regrets.
But I don't need you to let me go.
Astute of you, Commander--not that your epiphany is of any consequence. Your fate remains the same.
We don't have that kind of time!
I'm on it.
Sounds about right to me.
If the ship's utter destruction doesn't kill you, I'm sure Emperor Arcann will. He and the High Justice should be arriving very soon. Enjoy dying.
You must have blown a circuit during the fight.
You sound crazy.
You might not enjoy this so much once I permanently deactivate you.
It won't be wonderful for long.
It is only your existence that will end on this vessel, not mine.
Launch Malita Tal and her people next.
Save the Zakuulans.
Launch Admiral Ranken and her people next.
Save the Imperials.
They're almost out of time! Hurry!
Malita. My people. They're... they're dead.
I had to make a choice, but I was hoping all three shuttles would get away safely. I didn't want them to die.
I tried to save everyone.
If you made the call, the Zakuulan shuttle would have launched first. And my people might be the ones who died. Don't blame me for something you would have done yourself!
You would have done the same.
I know you're hurting right now, but there wasn't time to discuss it. I had to make a choice. Unfortunately, your people were the ones who suffered.
I'm sorry, Senya.
I don't believe this. Senator Cordan... dead.
I can't believe Admiral Ranken is dead.
I had to make a choice, but I was hoping all three shuttles would get away safely.
I tried to save everyone.
I had to make a choice, but I was hoping all three shuttles would get away safely.
I tried to save everyone.
I understand your anger, Senya. But we've all sacrificed for this war. Just remember that Arcann is the one truly responsible for their deaths.
We're all going to be dead if we don't get off this ship before it blows itself up!
We will suffer a similar fate if we fail to escape this vessel before it self-destructs.
There wasn't time to discuss it. I had to make a choice. But I didn't want them to die. You know that.
I'm sorry, Theron.
If you were calling the shots, my people would be the ones who didn't make it out alive. Don't blame me for something you would have done yourself!
You would have done the same.
The only way to defeat the Eternal Empire is if we all work together. I have to show that I won't put the needs of the Republic above anyone else.
Sacrifices must be made.
If you were calling the shots, my people would be the ones who didn't make it out alive. Don't blame me for something you would have done yourself!
You would have done the same.
There wasn't time to discuss it. I had to make a choice. But I didn't want them to die. You know that.
I'm sorry, Lana.
I understand your anger, Lana. But we've all suffered in this war. Just remember that Arcann is the one truly responsible for their deaths.
It wasn't a total loss. The prisoners we saved will help us in our battle against Arcann... as long as we get off this ship alive. Let's move out.
We found some new allies.
SCORPIO came up with this plan in the first place. Maybe it's fitting she didn't survive. Let's move out.
This was SCORPIO's failure.
